dialogue.content: I get anxious in the evenings and can't unwind.
Is it more racing thoughts, physical tension, or a general sense of worry?
Racing thoughts after work. I replay everything.
Got it. What helps even a little when it starts?
Short breathing helps sometimes. Long stuff makes me impatient.
Okay-short and repeatable. Anything that tends to make evenings worse?
Coffee probably makes it worse, but I still drink it most days.
Thanks-that's useful context. We can start with quick, in-the-moment tools.
When it hits after work, I just want something fast that actually cuts through the spiral.
